Reference

Core Functions

~ Functions for flood mapping

getRawData()

Download, process, and save HAND, catchmask and Rating Curve Data

map_flood()

Map flood extents from processed data

download_ut()

Download HAND, RC, and Cathmask rasters by HUC6

HAND Tiles Functions

~ Functions for gathering HAND tiles

get_hand_raster()

Get HAND Raster for an AOI

download_tiles()

Get HAND Tiles from an AWS S3 Bucket

merge_hand_tiles()

Merge Rasters

SRC Functions

~ Functions for generating synthetic rating curves

get_src()

Generate Synthetic Rating Curve

get_roughness()

Get roughness value prediction

get_catchmask()

Get catchmask raster via nhdplusTools

find_comids()

Find COMIDs for an AOI via the NHD

compute_cellres()

Get cell resolution

compute_flat_tub()

Get flat tub
